TopicTitle: Shader glow remover - Toggle the hover over green glow while in EVA/flight mode

Articles.Content:
I was asking around on [**this**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64574-Anyway-to-stop-the-green-part-highlight-on-mouseover/page4) page to see if anyone had found a way to disable the green highlight shader and it *appears* as though the only mod which did so, is now outdated. Would someone make a mod which uses the updated KSP shaders to disable the green glow? I know I'm not the only video maker who would *die* for the option. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)**Is a modder willing to try and find a fix for this?** There will be rep! Much, much rep. And video promotions.

- Joe Hafner

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-20T23:20:11Z" title="04/20/2015 11:20  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 20, 2015</time> by Avera9eJoe**

Here you are Avera9eJoe. I just wrote a new one, and it should disable highlighting on all vessels.

Direct download to just the mod: [https://github.com/ClawKSP/HighlighterOff/releases/download/v01.00/HighlighterOff.zip](https://github.com/ClawKSP/HighlighterOff/releases/download/v01.00/HighlighterOff.zip)

And the obligatory source repository: [https://github.com/ClawKSP/HighlighterOff/releases](https://github.com/ClawKSP/HighlighterOff/releases)

License is included in the download.

Cheers,

~Claw
